correct_order: It is clear that there is not consensus on economic reform
Otherwise the Congress would not have opposed PSU disinvestment today
Nor would allies of ruling NDA opposes privatization
All this would stop India from becoming the next superpower.

sources: Otherwise the Congress would not have opposed PSU disinvestment today
